text: David Davis (March 9, 1815 â€“ June 26, 1886) was an American politician and lawyer. He was the United States Senator from Illinois and Associate Justice of the Supreme Court. He also was Abraham Lincoln's campaign manager at the 1860 Republican National Convention. ==Other websites== * David Davis - McLean County Museum of History Category:1815 births Category:1886 deaths Category:Lawyers from Illinois Category:Politicians from Maryland Category:United States Supreme Court justices Category:United States senators from Illinois Category:People from Bloomington, Illinois Category:Presidents pro tempore of the United States Senate Category:Lawyers from Maryland
